actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation

official_title: To authorize appropriations for the design and construction of a hypersonic research airplane as part of the National Aerospace Plane Program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hypersonic Research Airplane Authorization Act of 1993

summary.text: Hypersonic Research Airplane Authorization Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Defense and the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to submit jointly to the Congress a plan for the National Aerospace Plane Program, including development plans (and capped costs) for a hypersonic research airplane. Authorizes specified appropriations.

titles.title: Hypersonic Research Airplane Authorization Act of 1993
To authorize appropriations for the design and construction of a hypersonic research airplane as part of the National Aerospace Plane Program, and for other purposes.
